title: This Love With U
description: It was supposed to be a one night stand, but fate had another plan.Now she has to face the pain of letting him go… or does she?When Lyric hopped on a plane to attend her favorite KPOP band’s concert in Las Vegas, the last thing she expected was to have a one-night stand with the hot Korean rapper, Jae-Mi.KPOP superstar, Jae-Mi, has worked hard to get where he is. He has given his blood, sweat, and tears to the entertainment industry. Now that he has reached a level of success beyond his wildest dreams - he won’t let anything or anyone stand in his way. Jae-MI, had no plans on falling for the curvy caramel woman he shared one steamy night with on tour. Will he take responsibility or will he walk away from the love of his life?This is a 15,000+ word novella. This is a 3 part series and a complete story on its own. Age 18+, Includes detailed, hot, steamy encounters of the best kind...#AMBW #BWAM #Interracial
author: Love Journey
